messages.speaker: mouse
messages.message: amazing, you can use your legs.

messages.speaker: gator
messages.message: i wasn't lying when i put that on my resume.

messages.speaker: mouse
messages.message: anyway, i'll teach you how to DASH.

messages.speaker: mouse
messages.message: hold X or SHIFT to charge your dash.

messages.speaker: mouse
messages.message: hold W / UP  when releasing to dash upwards.

messages.speaker: mouse
messages.message: try dashing up to the SHOP area.

messages.speaker: gator
messages.message: and hold W / UP to dash upwards...
